A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was amazing\, don't listen to the butt hurt reactions. As a movie alone it was solid\, a bit slow in some parts but more than making up for it with a powerful climax that rocks you.\nAs a Star Wars continuation\, it goes in a different direction from the Extended Universe (Wasn't that the point of throwing out the material to begin with?)\, which is fine because the Extended Universe did a fair amount of dumb out of character stuff. So they're starting from effectively Square 1 which is perfectly fine\, setting up to rebuild the Star Wars Universe without... well... George Lucas being an idiot.
